gills body colour and tattoo colour in the next round we will crochet the body colour and the tattoo colour alternately and from here on we join the rounds with slsts slip_stitch in next st ch2 do not count start in same st with body colour double_crochet change to tattoo colour double_crochet in the same st change to body colour do so for the whole round 24 24 double_crochet increase * 24 wanted to give you an idea of how it can be done you might have to adapt the stitches to the size of the eye you are using if you have to do that increase the number of half_double_crochet or double_crochet upper eyelid with tattoo colour insert your hook at the dark blue pin and start with surface sts row 1 2slst 1sc 6hdc 1sc 2slst ch1 turn row 2 2slst 1sc 6hdc or 6dc if you want a bigger eyelid 1sc 2slst fo weave in yarn lower eyelid with tattoo colour turn your cycloom upside down and start with surface sts at the green pins row 1 2 slip_stitch 6sc 2slst ch1 turn adjust sts if needed row 2 skip first 1sc to the end of row slip_stitch to get to upper eyelid fo leave a tail to sew the ends of the eyelids together @thenickcole 6 tattoos i crocheted the tattoos with surface slip_stitch since this is a tribal thing you can do the tattoos however you want each tribe has its own tattoos so you don t have to do the same ones as me
